resources.string: This application helps you to connect telegram. Try it.
Install the Telegram to use the proxy

"
 
 to access more FREE, FAST and POWERFUL proxies, please click on the link below: 

"
Use the following proxy to connect to Telegram \n\n
After entering the sun proxy application, touch the above button to access the daily proxy list.
You will see all the proxies like the above image. You need to touch the "CONNECT TO TELEGRAM" button to use the proxy.
After touching the "CONNECT TO TELEGRAM" button in the previous step, you will direct to the telegram application; touch the "Connect Proxy" button to active the proxy.
Tap the shield to access the proxy list
